title: Can't uninstall / reinstall or run LoL
body: So I can't load the game because it then says "Failed to create dump file",  and I can't uninstall or reinstall the program because "an error is preventing me from doing so".  Haven't found a fix some threads are old af and still nothing.  lmk!

replies.body: There might be a permission issue here causing this to happen, or missing files causing an issue with the uninstall.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a clean uninstall fixes this up for you.  You might also want to use our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your game files are added as an exception.  Let me know if you have any questions!
And this only started to happen since I downloaded LoL, checked space on my hard drive and all basic fixes, nothing has worked so far... buy a new pc for one game??

Hello thanks for the response, the problem is my computer physically won't begin any downloads or uninstallation processes. The mouse arrow simply continues to display that it's loading but won't open / uninstall any downloads/programs! :(
And this only started to happen since I downloaded LoL, checked space on my hard drive and all basic fixes, nothing has worked so far... buy a new pc for one game??
